_sText:
Reworked the balance. 

Respawn T has been moved. Added new passes on the map:

-passage from old respawn T to point A
-staircase from the flyover up to the tunnel (as in cs go)
-bridge to the nest
-second nest and extended back passage
-climb the boxes from the underpass to the second nest

The well-known standard map de_dust is not very popular compared to de_dust2.

The reason is its imbalance (CT gives a great advantage) and lack of variability. There are only two collision points on the map - under the overpass and in the palace.

The problem was partially solved in the same way as in CS GO, by adding a staircase from under the overpass to the top and a bridge to the nest.

A second nest and additional corridors have been added to make it possible to bypass the enemy from the rear, to point B.

This added maneuverability for the T, but still left two main impact points that the CT needed to control.

Therefore, it was necessary to add a new, third route connecting point A and the old spawn point T.

The T spawn point is moved to a new location, in front of the overpass, on the T side.

The CT respawn point is also moved forward a little so that players have time to take up defensive positions.

  • The CT spawn area is highlighted in blue, the T spawn area is highlighted in red.
  • The yellow lines highlight the main routes of the players on the surface of the map.
  • The routes under the overpass are marked with orange lines.
  • Purple lines indicate routes inside buildings.
